pages.title: Crafting Recipe
pages.text: Crafting recipe for a Grapevine Stem. You can use any sort of Oak Logs to craft it.$(br2)$(o)Grapevines will spread leaves around it which sometimes also can be harvested.

While it seems to be much easier to have lots of Grape Bushes its more efficient and space-saving to use Grapevine Stems.$(br2)To place Seeds on them you have to stack 2 Grapevine Stems on each other first.$(br)Then you're able to place either a Red Grape Seed or White Grape Seed on it.
